content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: MarkM started a talk-through of his investigation into whether to embrace AsyncContext at the SES Strategy Meeting yesterday. We didn’t get close to finishing the review, so this is Part 1, and we expect these to get gradually more refined https://youtu.be/vECr5IDJzpg
